# What columns do we want to select?
q = '''
SELECT  playerid
        ,teamid 
        ,ab
        ,h
        ROUND(h/(ab*1.0),3) as
        'BA'
ORDER BY AB, H DESC
LIMIT 5
'''
# ERRRORS

pd.read_sql_query(q,con)

```{python}
# %%
# What calculation do we want to perform?

q = '''
SELECT playerid, 
        teamid, 
        ab, 
        h, 
        ROUND(h/(ab*1.0),3)
        as 'BA'
FROM batting
LIMIT 100
'''

batting_calc = pd.read_sql_query(q,con)
batting_calc
```

```{python}
# %%
# What name do we give our calculated column?

q = '''
SELECT teamid, 
        yearid,
        Sum(r) AS Total_Runs
FROM batting
-- WHERE r>50
GROUP BY teamid, yearid
HAVING
Total_Runs > 1000
ORDER BY teamID, yearID ASC, Total_Runs DESC
LIMIT 10000
'''

batting_calc = pd.read_sql_query(q,con)
batting_calc
```
